caption.p: Subcritical water treatments of the mixture containing l-menthol, l-menthyl acetate, l-menthone, and piperitone. The subcritical water treatments were carried out at 180 °C (○), 200 °C (△), 220 °C (□), and 240 °C (◇). The reaction time was carried out for 5, 10, 20, and 60 min, respectively.
